layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x68
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x68
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x52
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 192x52 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 190x50
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 190x22
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 186x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=2]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 182x18
                text run at (2,2) width 182: "This cell spans two columns"
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,26) size 190x22
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,26) size 92x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 52x18
                text run at (2,2) width 52: "xxx xxx"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (96,26) size 92x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 52x18
                text run at (2,2) width 52: "xxx xxx"
